status: Site accessible (HTTP 200) but no main content rendering

coordination_agents.responsibility: WordPress theme investigation, content rendering fix
Previous fixes verification, theme file investigation

investigation_steps: 1. Verify theme template files (index.php, home.php, front-page.php) are rendering content
2. Check WordPress loop (the_content(), the_title(), etc.) in theme templates
3. Verify database content (posts, pages) exists and is published
4. Check for JavaScript errors preventing content rendering
5. Verify theme functions.php isn't suppressing content output
6. Check for CSS issues hiding content (display: none, visibility: hidden)
7. Verify WordPress query is returning posts/pages correctly

next_actions.action: Coordinate with Agent-7 to investigate WordPress theme template files
Coordinate with Agent-1 to verify previous fixes didn't break content rendering
Review Agent-8's comprehensive audit report for additional diagnostics
